const response = await client.ingest.putPipeline({
  id: "set_bar",
  description: "sets the value of bar from the field foo",
  processors: [
    {
      set: {
        field: "bar",
        copy_from: "foo",
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.ingest.simulate({
  id: "set_bar",
  docs: [
    {
      _source: {
        foo: ["foo1", "foo2"],
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response1);
